overview: Hollywood Hogan and "Macho Man" Randy Savage collide inside the confines of a 15-foot high solid steel cage. Sting defends the WCW World Heavyweight Championship against Scott Hall. Eddy Guerrero challenges Booker T for the WCW World Television Championship. Kevin Nash takes on The Giant. Dean Malenko looks to capture the WCW Cruiserweight Championship from Chris Jericho and more!
title: WCW Uncensored 1998
